title: Discovering Latent Structure in Clinical Databases

But the data only refers to the specific medication that the patient is taken, not the overall class of medication it belongs to.
So it's hard to find rules that are very meaningful or cover a lot of patients.
So what we've done is you does design an algorithm that can automatically learn these clusters.
Hierarchical clusters about this different drugs or diseases in the data, and incorporate these clusters into the rules that we learn.
